name: Splash Lake Waterpark
description:
Welcome to Splash Lake Waterpark! 

You are the new manager. Make sure you have as many happy guests as possible.  

On the top bar you can see the number of guests at the park, the water you have available to run the attractions, the number of available staff members, and the overall happiness score of the guests. If you click on the name of an attraction, that attraction’s information will appear. You can view the amount of water that attraction takes to run, increase or decrease the number of staff working that attraction, and open or close the attraction or individual lanes.  

Each attraction display shows the number of parties in line for that attraction. If people have to wait too long in line >span class="NormalTextRun SCXW127405429 BCX0">be unhappy. Try to keep lines as short as possible.
